problem.markdown:
1. What would be the equivalent pointer expression for referring the array element a[i][j][k][l] ( ) ((((a+i)+j)+k)+l) (x) *(*(*(*(a+i)+j)+k)+l) ( ) (((a+i)+j)+k+l) ( ) ((a+i)+j+k+l)
2. NULL pointer points to the 0th memory address: (x) True ( ) False
3. Pointer is a : ( ) A keyword used to create variables ( ) A variable that stores address of an instruction (x) A variable that stores address of other variable ( ) All of the above
problem.p: 1. What would be the equivalent pointer expression for referring the array element a[i][j][k][l]
2. NULL pointer points to the 0th memory address:

choicegroup.choice: A keyword used to create variables
A variable that stores address of an instruction
A variable that stores address of other variable
